Text:
Can any1 tell me what type of file this is? 
Is it an mp4?
@PW5, it is probably a .mkv, which is playable through VLC

ZetoxJR: Thank you. I hate mkv files :) 
Coz I wanna watch the show on my tv with friends & my media player doesn't play mkv :(  
Guess I'm gonna have to get a mkv to avi converter coz so many shows & movies are coming out that way now. Still haven't found Skins 6.02 on anything other than mkv.
It's MP4, not MKV. Much lower video quality than I expected - what's the point of still doing these in SD? A smaller file size at 720p looks better than this. At least somebody put it up this time.
Audio is also not great. Maybe I'm just too spoiled for PDTV source?
oh come onnnnnn, someone upload this in 720p please :(
